items.sentence: Why do you think that Tom would do such a thing?
Tom couldn't figure out how to get the box open.
Tom told me that he had to stay here until 2:30.
We all chipped in to buy Tom a birthday present.
Tom tried to do something that couldn't be done.
The only one who wasn't drinking coffee was Tom.
We ended up paying more than we expected to pay.
There are three issues we need to discuss today.
Tom wrote a book about living with disabilities.
What I want is for things to get back to normal.
What I want is for everyone to follow the rules.
Even if you'd tried it, it wouldn't have worked.
You have to wait until a seat becomes available.
It's hard to make anything out in fog like this.
I knew that Tom was standing behind the curtain.
Why don't we solve try to this problem together?
Tom didn't introduce Mary to any of his friends.
Don't forget to buy some bread on your way home.
I've only seen a rainbow once in my entire life.
I don't have any cash, but I have a credit card.
I never slept on that bench when I was homeless.
Does anyone have a logical explanation for this?
Tom told me he wanted to get his tattoo removed.
I hope that your fingerprints aren't on the gun.
How long do you think those batteries will last?
The police had trouble putting handcuffs on Tom.
I'm grateful for everything you've done for Tom.
All four of Tom's grandparents are still living.
They found Tom's body buried in a shallow grave.
Tom and I used to go mountain climbing together.
It took me some time to persuade Tom to do that.
It doesn't matter whether Tom comes late or not.
It took a long time for me to write this report.
Tom complained about the noise Mary's dogs made.
Tom didn't allow Mary to go to Boston with John.
Tom didn't know when Mary was planning to leave.
Tom didn't know why Mary wanted to go to Boston.
Tom didn't want to tell Mary what was happening.
Why aren't you doing what we've asked you to do?
Why don't you like to speak in French in public?
The dogs began to howl when Tom started to sing.
Tom blamed Mary even though it wasn't her fault.
I'll come and pick you up at your place at 2:30.
Do you really believe it's absolutely necessary?
I don't want to be involved with anyone anymore.
These days everything I do is bad for my health.
If you need a fountain pen, I will lend you one.
The girls were sitting right next to each other.
There's nothing that can't be bought with money.
I began to play the saxophone when I was thirty.
